Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: Just received it a couple of days ago and I am very pleased. Packaged well and even gift wrapped so you could just slap a bow on it if giving it as a gift, but I bought for myself. Note pad works well so far and has a good quality feel to it. Best thing about the product is how cheap it is. I can not believe how well it works for the price I paid !!!  I did not even pay anything for shipping and ordered it last Thursday and it arrived 4 days later on Monday, which was several days earlier than advertised. Very happy with this supplier and Amazon on this purchase.
Reviews.Title: Tablet incredible price

Reviews.Author: Jonathan Guo
Reviews.Content: Great product for such low prices. My friend bought one and he recommended this one to me. I was laughing him about buying cheapy staff. Once I bought it. I am really happy for this. This tablet has all the function and it is cheap and you dont need to worry about losing it and a great backup tablet for my vocation.
Reviews.Title: Great product for such low prices
